content: पयस् {%<ab>n.</ab>%} {@--1@} Water. {@--2@} Milk; पयःपानं भुजंगानां केवलं विषवर्धनं <ls>H. 3. 4</ls>; <ls>R. 2. 36</ls>, <ls n="R. 2.">63</ls>; <ls n="R.">14. 78</ls> (where both senses are intended). {@--3@} Semen virile. {@--4@} Food. {@--5@} <ab>Ved.</ab> Night. {@--6@} Vital spirit, power, strength (<ab>Ved.</ab>). (पयस् is changed to पंयो before soft con-sonants).
